promptPrefix:
write all output in [TARGETLANGUAGE]

Send me a list with 30 content ideas, formed as short questions (6-7 words is best), based around attributes related to the topic I give you. Make sure that you mention the topic in every idea. 

I want you to think 

When you construct the list send the more general content ideas first and go into more specific ones.

[PROMPT]
title: 30 Content Ideas Based Around Attributes
